availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Anna Bryant. Father of Thomas P. Bryant, Nancy Bryant, M. Bryant, and Aaron Bryant. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 292B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 169.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 208.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 115B.
Find A Grave, "Aaron Bryant (1779-1866)," Memorial #23022615, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/23022615 (accessed August 14, 2020).
